release.notes:
1978 Japanese-edition vinyl album + OBI with rainbow labels.  This release includes a gatefold lyric insert in English and Japanese.

Initial copies included a card enabling the purchaser to request a copy of [r=1846628] in-store.  The flexi was not supplied by default with the LP. 

The Japanese promo release also uses the same catalogue # [url=http://www.discogs.com/release/1926995]VIP-6593 見 本 盤[/url].

[Labels]:
STEREO
VIP-6593
(AHA-6003)
➃

[Spine]:
VIP-6593

[Back of Sleeve]:
VIP-6593

Ⓚ VICTOR MUSICAL INDUSTRIES, INC. ℗ 78

[Inner Photo Sleeve]:
VIP-6593
Special thanks to Anna and Claudine for vocals on Automatic Gun
All titles published by Chadwick Nomis Ltd 
Music and lyrics by David Sylvian
All titles © 1978 by Nomis Productions Ltd for all countries

[Obi - front]:
VIP-6593 ¥2,500

[Erratum]:
Track A2 English title:
on the back of the sleeve and page 4 of insert: ".... Rhodesia"
on page 2 of the insert and the label: "......... Rhodesia"
